question: What is Liu Shiwen famous for?
option1: As a Chinese table tennis player
answer: As a Chinese table tennis player
explanation: Liu Shiwen is a Chinese table tennis player. Liu Shiwen is a Chinese table tennis player who is a 5-time World Cup champion, one-time World Champion, 3-time ITTF World Tour Grand Finals champion and 4-time Asian Cup champion. She is known to be one of the fastest players in the world.
